NavigatorGetInstalledRelatedApps.summary: The getInstalledRelatedApps() method returns a promise that resolves with an array of objects representing any related platform-specific apps or Progressive Web Apps that the user has installed. This could be used for content personalization such as removing "install our app" banners from the web app if the platform-specific app and/or PWA is already installed.

blockquote.para: Note: This method must be invoked in a top-level secure context, that is, not embedded in an iframe.

remarks.para: -Is your app installed? getInstalledRelatedApps() will tell you!

NavigatorGetInstalledRelatedApps.returns: A that fulfills with an array of objects representing any installed related apps. Each object can contain the following properties:The related app information must have been previously specified in the related_applications member of the invoking web app's manifest file.
